requirements.text: System shall support parallel execution of independent tasks within phases

verification.description: Independent tasks spawn concurrently and dependencies are respected

requirements.text: System shall provide structured user acceptance testing via /tiki:verify command

verification.description: UAT reports are generated with manual testing checklists

requirements.text: System shall validate JSON state files against schemas to prevent corruption

verification.description: JSON Schema files exist and tests validate plan files against schemas

requirements.text: Large command files shall be reviewed for potential modularization

verification.description: Files over 500 lines analyzed and splitting decisions documented

requirements.text: Command naming shall follow standardized verb-noun conventions

verification.description: All commands follow naming pattern with deprecated aliases for old names

requirements.text: execute.md shall document Diagnostic Agent strategy and prompt template

verification.description: execute-autofix.test.js passes for Diagnostic Agent documentation
